original_text: Because of their mistake, God has done good things for everyone in the world. Israel's people failed to receive what God wanted to give them. As a result, the Gentiles have received very many good things from God. That was the good result when Israel's people failed. So, when the complete number of Israel's people do turn to God, the result will be even better! Paul speaks to the Gentiles Because of their mistake, God has done good things for everyone in the world. Israel's people failed to receive what God wanted to give them. As a result, the Gentiles have received very many good things from God. That was the good result when Israel's people failed. So, when the complete number of Israel's people do turn to God, the result will be even better!
korean_text: 그들의 넘어짐이 세상의 풍성함이 되며 그들의 실패가 이방인의 풍성함이 되거든 하물며 그들의 충만함이리요

sentences.original_text: God has done good things for everyone in the world
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 세상 모든 사람에게 좋은 것을 하셨다

sentences.original_text: Israel's people failed to receive what God wanted to give them
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성은 하나님이 주시려고 하신 것을 받지 못했다

sentences.original_text: the Gentiles have received very many good things from God
sentences.korean_translation: 이방인들은 하나님으로부터 아주 많은 좋은 것들을 받았다

sentences.original_text: That was the good result when Israel's people failed
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 이스라엘 백성이 실패했을 때 좋은 결과였다

sentences.original_text: when the complete number of Israel's people do turn to God
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성의 완전한 수가 하나님께 돌아올 때

sentences.original_text: the result will be even better
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과는 훨씬 더 좋을 것이다
